content:
LCD LG L1940P Premium Artistic Series LX40 (19 inč)

General
MPN: L1940P
Display Type: Flat panel display / TFT active matrix
TFT Technology: TN
Width: 44.2 cm
Depth: 16.5 cm
Height: 50.7 cm
Weight: 7.3 kg
Enclosure Colour: ( the image of the product displayed may be of a different colour )

Display
Diagonal Size: 19"
Dot Pitch / Pixel Pitch: 0.294 mm
Max Resolution: 1280 x 1024 / 75 Hz
Max Sync Rate (V x H): 75 Hz x 83 kHz
Response Time: 25 ms
Controls / Adjustments: Brightness, contrast
Display Screen Coating: Anti-glare, anti-static
Signal Input: DVI-D, VGA

Image
Image Brightness: 300 cd/m2
Image Contrast Ratio: 700:1
Image Max H-View Angle: 170
Image Max V-View Angle: 170

Video input
Analogue video Signal: RGB
Digital Video Standard: Digital Visual Interface (DVI)

 
	

	
	
		
		

		
			
		
		
	


	
		
	




Cena: 150€
author: Nobody
